mapper.select: (SELECT s.startprogramid, s.programlistid, s.programname, s.informpeople, s.starttheorydate, s.theorysite, s.startoperationdate, s.operationsite, s.expirationdate, s.materialsexpirationdate, s.informperson, s.programcode, s.programhard, s.insideoutside, s.mandatory, s.isonline, s.thelength, s.validity, s.money, s.remindtime, s.isfirst, s.applydata, s.applydataurl, s.standard, s.questionnum, s.programtype, s.actualstartdate, -- 在这里用MODIFYON作为到期时间，可以少写一个vo DATE_ADD( t.finallyexamdate, INTERVAL s.validity MONTH ) AS MODIFYON FROM startprogram AS s INNER JOIN trainjoinlist AS t ON s.startprogramid = t.startprogramid WHERE t.`STATUS` = '0' AND t.personnelid = #{id} AND t.jointype = '正常' AND t.throughtype = '通过' AND t.finallyexamdate IS NOT NULL AND s.starttheorydate IS NOT NULL AND s.programtype in ('BC039004') AND s.isonline='BC032001' AND DATEDIFF(DATE_SUB( DATE_ADD( t.finallyexamdate, INTERVAL s.validity MONTH ), INTERVAL s.remindtime MONTH ),CURRENT_DATE ()) =0) UNION ALL (SELECT s.startprogramid, s.programlistid, s.programname, s.informpeople, s.starttheorydate, s.theorysite, s.startoperationdate, s.operationsite, s.expirationdate, s.materialsexpirationdate, s.informperson, s.programcode, s.programhard, s.insideoutside, s.mandatory, s.isonline, s.thelength, s.validity, s.money, s.remindtime, s.isfirst, s.applydata, s.applydataurl, s.standard, s.questionnum, s.programtype, s.actualstartdate, -- 在这里用MODIFYON作为到期时间，可以少写一个vo DATE_ADD( s.starttheorydate, INTERVAL s.validity MONTH ) AS MODIFYON FROM startprogram AS s INNER JOIN trainjoinlist AS t ON s.startprogramid = t.startprogramid WHERE t.`STATUS` = '0' AND t.personnelid = #{id} AND t.jointype = '正常' AND t.throughtype = '通过' AND s.starttheorydate IS NOT NULL AND s.programtype in ('BC039004') AND s.isonline='BC032002' AND DATEDIFF(DATE_SUB( DATE_ADD( s.starttheorydate, INTERVAL s.validity MONTH ), INTERVAL s.remindtime MONTH ),CURRENT_DATE ()) =0) ORDER BY MODIFYON ASC

select count(tl.throughtype) as cnt, tl.throughtype as vehicletype from startprogram sp left join trainjoinlist tl on sp.startprogramid = tl.startprogramid where sp.programtype = 'BC039004' and sp.mandatory = 'BC033001' group by tl.throughtype

select count(tl.throughtype) as cnt, tl.throughtype as vehicletype from startprogram sp left join trainjoinlist tl on sp.startprogramid = tl.startprogramid where sp.programtype = 'BC039004' and sp.mandatory = 'BC033002' group by tl.throughtype

SELECT t.personnelid, t.customername, t.departmentname, t.jobnumber, s.programname, s.starttheorydate, t.throughtype, s.thelength FROM startprogram AS s INNER JOIN trainjoinlist AS t ON s.startprogramid = t.startprogramid WHERE s.`STATUS` = "0" AND t.`STATUS` = "0" AND EXTRACT( YEAR FROM s.starttheorydate ) = #{year} AND s.programtype = 'BC039004' AND t.jointype = '正常' AND ( t.throughtype = '通过' OR t.throughtype = '未通过' ) ORDER BY s.starttheorydate DESC

SELECT round(SUM(s.thelength),1) FROM startprogram AS s INNER JOIN trainjoinlist AS t ON s.startprogramid = t.startprogramid WHERE s.`STATUS` = "0" AND t.`STATUS` = "0" AND t.jointype = '正常' AND ( t.throughtype = '通过' OR t.throughtype = '未通过' ) AND s.programtype = 'BC039004' AND EXTRACT( YEAR FROM s.starttheorydate )=#{year} AND t.personnelid = #{parameter}

SELECT t.departmentname FROM startprogram AS s INNER JOIN trainjoinlist AS t ON s.startprogramid = t.startprogramid WHERE s.`STATUS` = "0" AND t.`STATUS` = "0" AND EXTRACT( YEAR FROM s.starttheorydate )=#{year} AND t.personnelid = #{parameter} ORDER BY s.CREATEON DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT s.programname, s.starttheorydate, s.insideoutside, s.isonline FROM startprogram AS s WHERE s.`STATUS` = '0' AND s.programtype = 'BC039002' AND DATEDIFF(s.starttheorydate,CURRENT_DATE ()) > 0
